text: This is a list of colleges and universities in Rhode Island: ==Public== *Community College of Rhode Island **Downcity Campus **Knight Campus **Flanagan Campus **Liston Campus **Newport County Campus **Satellite Campus *Naval War College *Rhode Island College *University of Rhode Island ==Private== *Brown University *Bryant University *Gibbs College *Johnson and Wales University *New England Institute of Technology *Providence College *Rhode Island School of Design *Roger Williams University *Salve Regina University *Zion Bible College ==References== * Category:Lists of colleges and universities
title: Colleges and universities in Rhode Island
